Action.Name: You are not being able to reach some website
Action.Explanation: Your are trying to go to some website but connexion does not seem to work, or you can not reach site, or you have some errors
Action.Alerte_MSG:
An action will be executed in background. Tru again after clicking on OK.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: You have connexion issues on your devices
Action.Explanation: Your are trying to go to some website but connexion does not seem to work, or you can not reach site, or you have some errors
Action.Alerte_MSG:
An action will be executed in background. Tru again after clicking on OK.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Clear temporary files
Action.Explanation: Your device is running slow
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Temporary files will be deleted.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Your device is running slow
Action.Explanation: Your device is running slow
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Temporary files and recycle bin content will be deleted
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Clear Google Chrome browsing data (cache)
Action.Explanation: Clear Google Chrome browsing data (cache)
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Google Chrome browsing data will be deleted.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Clear Firefox browsing data (cache)
Action.Explanation: Clear Firefox browsing data (cache)
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Firefox browsing data will be deleted.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: The "Teams meeting" button is missing in Outlook
Action.Explanation: The "Teams meeting" button is missing in Outlook
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Outlook will close and then open again automatically.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Starting OneDrive client
Action.Explanation: OneDrive is not running
Action.Alerte_MSG: This action allow you to start your OneDrive client

Action.Name: Restart OneDrive client
Action.Explanation: Restarting OneDrive can sometimes solve some issues like synchronization issues.
Action.Alerte_MSG:
OneDrive will be closed and opened again automatically
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Solve OneDrive synchronisation issues (step 1)
Action.Explanation:
You have synchronization issues with your files, folders on OneDrive.
This first step will restart OneDrive. OneDrive will be closed and opened again automatically
If the issue is still here, run "Reset OneDrive" step
Action.Alerte_MSG:
This first step allows you to restat OneDrive.
If the issue is still here, run "Reset OneDrive" step
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: OneDrive does not start: error 0x8004def4
Action.Explanation: error 0x8004def4 is displayed while running OneDrive
Action.Alerte_MSG:
OneDrive will be closed and opened again automatically
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Your device is slow: OneDrive uses a lot of memory on your device
Action.Explanation: Your device is running slow and OneDrive seems to use a lot of memory.
Action.Alerte_MSG:
OneDrive will be closed and opened again automatically
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Red cross on OneDrive
Action.Explanation: A red cross is displayed on the OneDrive icon
Action.Alerte_MSG:
This first step allows you to restat OneDrive.
If the issue is still here, run "Reset OneDrive" step
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: OneDrive close itself
Action.Explanation: You faced issue with OneDrive which opens and close automatically itself
Action.Alerte_MSG:
This first step allows you to restat OneDrive.
If the issue is still here, run "Reset OneDrive" step
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: White cross on OneDrive files
Action.Explanation: White cross are displayed on OneDrive files or folders
Action.Alerte_MSG:
This first step allows you to restart OneDrive.
If the issue is still here, run "Reset OneDrive" step
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Issues with OneDrive after changing Windows password
Action.Explanation:
You have changed your password recently and now you're facing some issues with OneDrive like synchronization issue.
This step will restart the OneDrive client.
Action.Alerte_MSG:
This first step allows you to restart OneDrive.
If the issue is still here, run "Reset OneDrive" step
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: You can not open files on OneDrive
Action.Explanation: You can not open files on OneDrive
Action.Alerte_MSG:
This first step allows you to restart OneDrive.
If the issue is still here, run "Reset OneDrive" step
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Folders synchronization is working on OneDrive but not on Teams
Action.Explanation: Folders synchronization is working on OneDrive but not on Teams
Action.Alerte_MSG:
OneDrive will be reseted.
Reseting OneDrive won't loss of data
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Reseting OneDrive client
Action.Explanation:
You're facing issues with OneDrive like synchronization issues.
This step will reset Your OneDrive client.
Reseting the OneDrive client will not cause any data loss.
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Your OneDrive client will be reseted.
If the issue still occur after that, please contact your support.
Reseting the OneDrive client will not cause any data loss.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Solve Teams connexion issues
Action.Explanation: You can not connect to Teams
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Your Teams client will be closed and opened automatically.
If the issue still occur, please click on "Disconnect" in Teams. After reconnecting on Teams, if the issue still occur please contact your support.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Solve teams profil picture synchronization
Action.Explanation: Your picture profil is not displayed in Teams and is not updated
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Your Teams client will be closed and opened automatically.
If the issue still occur, please click on "Disconnect" in Teams. After reconnecting on Teams, if the issue still occur please contact your support.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Folders synchronization is working on OneDrive but not on Teams
Action.Explanation: Folders synchronization is working on OneDrive but not on Teams
Action.Alerte_MSG:
Your OneDrive client will be reseted.
If the issue still occur after that, please contact your support.
Reseting the OneDrive client will not cause any data loss.
Do you want to continue ?

Action.Name: Screen is blocked in "Loading Microsoft Teams"

Action.Alerte_MSG:
Teams will close and then open again automatically.
If the issue still occur, please click on "Disconnect" in Teams.
After reconnecting on Teams, if the issue still occur please contact your support.
